content: I have completed the appleseed task3 and almost on the verge of completion of #4...i want to claim #5 before the competition and my current subbmission is of dice...What should i do...Should i abandon the dice and submit #3? Please tell me @Sean , @Daniel Rossberg @LordOfBikes
@Mitesh it is what it is... the pace of reviews couldn't really be sped up any more than they were. still, feel free to keep working on and finish that task chain

Working with BRL-CAD
Hey! IF YOU HAVE A QUESTION, submit your task for review.

WANT A STICKER? Subscribe https://sf.net/projects/brlcad/lists/brlcad-news & ask parents to send postal address to devs@brlcad.org Want to talk? Install Zulip, connect to brlcad.zulipchat.com

i'm talking about this....!
how to get this..?
@Parth Pandya if you sent your address, you just need to wait as the stickers are being prepared
@Mikki Jhuria Which tasks have you already done? The usual way to learn BRL-CAD is to install it first (there is a beginner task for it) and the tutorials then (Learn basic 3D modeling ...).
